extracted_text: [2] Decreased to 6,000 square feet for lots in conservation subdivisions.
llm_outputs.rationale: The table on page 147 provides the minimum lot area for the LDR district, which is 30,000 square feet. However, note [2] indicates this can be decreased to 6,000 square feet for lots in conservation subdivisions.
llm_outputs.answer: 30,000 sq ft (6,000 sq ft for conservation subdivisions)
